snl.es_gui.apps.tech_selection.fAux module

snl.es_gui.apps.tech_selection.fAux.geom_mean(vals, weights=None)[source]
snl.es_gui.apps.tech_selection.fAux.pdSeriesIdxWhereTrue(pdSeries)[source]

Return the indexes of a pandas series for which the corresponding values are True (boolean).

pdSeries: pandas series

Input pandas series of the type Boolean

List

Indexes of the pandas series that correspond to True values

snl.es_gui.apps.tech_selection.fFeasibility module

snl.es_gui.apps.tech_selection.fFeasibility.isFeasibleTech_Duration(techDB, selected_duration, remaining_feasible_techs=None)[source]

Identify which ES techs are feasible for the current project based on the minimum discharge duration required for the selected application.

techDB: pandas dataframe

Database containing detailed information for multiple ES techs

selected_duration: float

Minimum discharge duration required for the selected application

remaining_feasible_techs: list, optional

List of ES techs to be evaluated for feasibility; the default is None (use all ES techs in the database)

List with a subset of ES techs that satisfy the minimum discharge duration requirement

snl.es_gui.apps.tech_selection.fFeasibility.isFeasibleTech_ElectricOutput(techDB, requires_electric_output, remaining_feasible_techs=None)[source]

Identify which ES techs are feasible for the current project based on the need of an output in electric form for the selected application.

techDB: pandas dataframe

Database containing detailed information for multiple ES techs

requires_electric_output: string

Indicator of whether the selected application requires an electric output (‘Yes’ or ‘No’)

remaining_feasible_techs: list, optional

List of ES techs to be evaluated for feasibility; the default is None (use all ES techs)

List with a subset of ES techs that satisfy the electric output requirement

snl.es_gui.apps.tech_selection.fFeasibility.isFeasibleTech_Location(techDB, selected_location)[source]

Identify which ES techs are feasible for the current project based on the location where the ESS will be connected to the electric grid.

techDB: pandas dataframe

Database containing detailed information for multiple ES techs

selected_location: string

Location where the ESS will be connected to the electric grid; valid values are ‘Transmission/Central’, ‘Distribution’, ‘BTM: Commercial/industrial’, and ‘BTM: residential’

List with a subset of ES techs that satisfy the grid location restriction

snl.es_gui.apps.tech_selection.fFeasibility.isFeasibleTech_ResponseTime(techDB, selected_response_time, remaining_feasible_techs=None)[source]

Identify which ES techs are feasible for the current project based on the minimum response time to full power required for the selected application.

techDB: pandas dataframe

Database containing detailed information for multiple ES techs

selected_response_time: string

Minimum response time to full power required for the selected application; valid values are ‘ms’, ‘sec’, ‘min’, and’hrs’

remaining_feasible_techs: list, optional

List of ES techs to be evaluated for feasibility; the default is None (use all ES techs in the database)

List with a subset of ES techs that satisfy the minimum response time requirement
